<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List of free bare metal servers</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/backend/api/servers/free_servers/"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Retrieve a list of free bare metal servers.
